TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IValueProvider

summary.span: 公開方法與屬性，以支援控制項的使用者介面自動化用戶端存取，這些控制項具有未擴展範圍且可表示為字串的內建值。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls having an intrinsic value that does not span a range and that can be represented as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的值可能會或可能不是可編輯的根據控制項和其設定。The value of the control may or may not be editable depending on the control and its settings. 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指定控制項的值是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.

value.span: 如果該值是唯讀的則為 ，如果該值可修改則為 。

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的 應該設為 `true` ， 應該設為 `false` ，才能允許呼叫 。A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` before allowing a call to . ## Examples 下列範例顯示的控制項可讓要變更其值，這個方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that allows its value to be changed. [!code-csharp[UIAIValueProvider_snip#IsReadOnly](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIValueProvider_snip/CSharp/ValueFragment.cs#isreadonly)] [!code-vb[UIAIValueProvider_snip#IsReadOnly](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIValueProvider_snip/visualbasic/valuefragment.vb#isreadonly)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetValue(string value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 提供者會負責將值轉換成適當的資料類型。

span.span: The provider is responsible for converting the value to the appropriate data type.
Sets the value of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單行編輯控制項支援藉由實作 ，以程式設計方式存取其內容。Single-line edit controls support programmatic access to their contents by implementing . 不過，多行編輯控制項不會實作 ；它們是改為藉由實作 來提供其內容的存取。However, multi-line edit controls do not implement ; instead they provide access to their content by implementing . 例如，控制和必須實作是否可編輯的任何項目值，不論目前的編輯控制項模式。Controls such as and must implement if the value of any of the items is editable, regardless of the current edit mode of the control. 父控制項也必須實作如果子項目是可編輯。The parent control must also implement if the child items are editable. ![可編輯的清單項目。](~/add/media/uia-valuepattern-editable-listitem.PNG "可編輯的清單項目。")![Editable list item.](~/add/media/uia-valuepattern-editable-listitem.PNG "Editable list item.") 可編輯的清單項目範例Example of an Editable List Item ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂控制項，可讓其值設為限制長度的字串。The following example code demonstrates a custom control that allows its value to be set to a string of limited length. [!code-csharp[UIAIValueProvider_snip#SetValue](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIValueProvider_snip/CSharp/ValueFragment.cs#setvalue)] [!code-vb[UIAIValueProvider_snip#SetValue](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIValueProvider_snip/visualbasic/valuefragment.vb#setvalue)]

exception.span: 如果地區設定特有的資訊以不正確的格式傳遞至控制項，例如日期格式不正確。

span.span: If locale-specific information is passed to a control in an incorrect format such as an incorrectly formatted date.

exception.span: 如果新的值不能從字串轉換成控制項可辨識的格式。

span.span: If a new value cannot be converted from a string to a format the control recognizes.

exception.span: 嘗試對未啟用的控制項進行操作。

span.span: When an attempt is made to manipulate a control that is not enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the value of the control.

value.span: 控制項的值，以字串表示。

span.span: The value of the control as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單行編輯控制項支援以程式設計方式存取其內容，藉由實作(除了)。Single-line edit controls support programmatic access to their contents by implementing (in addition to ). 不過，多行編輯控制項不會實作。However, multi-line edit controls do not implement . 若要擷取多行編輯控制項的文字內容，控制項必須實作。To retrieve the textual contents of multi-line edit controls, the controls must implement . 不過， 不支援設定控制項的值。However, does not support setting the value of a control. 不支援擷取格式設定資訊或子字串值。 does not support the retrieval of formatting information or substring values. 在這些案例中請實作 。Implement in these scenarios. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的控制項可讓要擷取其值，這個方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that allows its value to be retrieved. [!code-csharp[UIAIValueProvider_snip#Value](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIValueProvider_snip/CSharp/ValueFragment.cs#value)] [!code-vb[UIAIValueProvider_snip#Value](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIValueProvider_snip/visualbasic/valuefragment.vb#value)]
